00143 //  ---------------------- Doxygen info ----------------------

00152     bool CheckForValidity(      unsigned int    *DegreeOfFreedom    = NULL
00153                             ,   int             *ErrorCode          = NULL) const
00154     {
00155         unsigned int        i                           =   0;
00156     
00157         double              MinimumOrderOfMagnitude     =   0.0
00158                         ,   MaximumOrderOfMagnitude     =   0.0;
00159                         
00160         for (i = 0; i < this->NumberOfDOFs; i++)
00161         {
00162             if ((this->SelectionVector->VecData)[i])
00163             {
00164                 if (this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData[i] <=  0.0)
00165                 {
00166                     if ((ErrorCode != NULL) && (DegreeOfFreedom != NULL))
00167                     {
00168                         *DegreeOfFreedom    =   i;
00169                         *ErrorCode          =   RMLInputParameters::IP_MAX_ACCELERATION;
00170                     }
00171                     return(false);
00172                 }
00173                 if (this->MaxJerkVector->VecData[i] <=  0.0)
00174                 {
00175                     if ((ErrorCode != NULL) && (DegreeOfFreedom != NULL))
00176                     {
00177                         *DegreeOfFreedom    =   i;
00178                         *ErrorCode          =   RMLInputParameters::IP_MAX_JERK;
00179                     }
00180                     return(false);
00181                 }
00182                 if (    ((this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]  >=  (this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)                  [i] )
00183                     &&  ((this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData)      [i]))
00184                     &&  ((this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData)     [i]))
00185                     &&  ((this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->CurrentVelocityVector->VecData)     [i]))
00186                     &&  ((this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData) [i])))              
00187                 {
00188                     MaximumOrderOfMagnitude =   (this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i];
00189                 }
00190                 else
00191                 {
00192                     if (    ((this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData)      [i]))
00193                         &&  ((this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData)     [i]))
00194                         &&  ((this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->CurrentVelocityVector->VecData)     [i]))
00195                         &&  ((this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i]  >=  fabs((this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData) [i])))              
00196                     {
00197                         MaximumOrderOfMagnitude =   (this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i];
00198                     }
00199                     else
00200                     {
00201                         if (    (fabs((this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData)[i]) >=  fabs((this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData)     [i]))
00202                             &&  (fabs((this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData)[i]) >=  fabs((this->CurrentVelocityVector->VecData)     [i]))
00203                             &&  (fabs((this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData)[i]) >=  fabs((this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData) [i])))
00204                         {
00205                             MaximumOrderOfMagnitude =   fabs((this->TargetVelocityVector->VecData)[i]);
00206                         }
00207                         else
00208                         {
00209                             if (    (fabs((this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData)[i])    >=  fabs((this->CurrentVelocityVector->VecData)     [i]))
00210                                 &&  (fabs((this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData)[i])    >=  fabs((this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData) [i])))              
00211                             {
00212                                 MaximumOrderOfMagnitude =   fabs((this->CurrentPositionVector->VecData)[i]);
00213                             }
00214                             else
00215                             {
00216                                 MaximumOrderOfMagnitude =   fabs((this->CurrentAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]);
00217                             }
00218                         }
00219                     }       
00220                 }               
00221 
00222                 if ((this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i]   <=  (this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i])
00223                 {
00224                     MinimumOrderOfMagnitude =   (this->MaxAccelerationVector->VecData)[i];
00225                 }
00226                 else
00227                 {
00228                     MinimumOrderOfMagnitude =   (this->MaxJerkVector->VecData)[i];
00229                 }                                       
00230                 
00231                 // The value of MinimumOrderOfMagnitude is greater than
00232                 // zero:                
00233                 if (    (MaximumOrderOfMagnitude / MinimumOrderOfMagnitude)
00234                     >   (double)pow((float)10, (int)(RMLVelocityInputParameters::MAXIMUM_MAGNITUDE_RANGE)))
00235                 {
00236                     if ((ErrorCode != NULL) && (DegreeOfFreedom != NULL))
00237                     {
00238                         *DegreeOfFreedom    =   i;
00239                         *ErrorCode          =   RMLInputParameters::IP_ORDER_OF_MAGNITUDE;
00240                     }        
00241                     return(false);
00242                 }
00243             }
00244         }
00245         if (this->MinimumSynchronizationTime > 1e10)
00246         {
00247             if (ErrorCode != NULL)
00248             {
00249                 *ErrorCode = RMLInputParameters::IP_MINIMUM_SYNC_TIME;
00250             }        
00251             return(false);
00252         }
00253         
00254         if (    (this->OverrideValue < 0.0)
00255             ||  (this->OverrideValue > 10.0)    )
00256         {
00257             if (ErrorCode != NULL)
00258             {
00259                 *ErrorCode = RMLInputParameters::IP_OVERRIDE_VALUE;
00260             }        
00261             return(false);
00262         }
00263         
00264         if (ErrorCode != NULL)
00265         {
00266             *ErrorCode = RMLInputParameters::IP_NO_ERROR;
00267         }
00268         return(true);       
00269     }
